name: Artista - Cimarron Maduro - Gordo
additionalNotes: These are the Cimarron Regions of America and the inspiration for Cimarron Cigars. One is a spicy Maduro complimented with hints of earthy sweetness, the other is a mellow Connecticut Shade that enhances notes of cedar, leather, and earth. Feautres notes of cracked black pepper, summer hay, leather and aged Spanish cedar.
